urls.title: Upgrading Driftâ€™s Leverage System: From Account-Level to Custom Leverage Per-Market | Drift Updates
urls.description: Drift is upgrading its leverage model to a custom-market basis to give traders more control. Starting now, leverage will be set per market instead of at the account level, making trading experience more flexible

data.text: Find out more: https://t.co/qRSSETTwUE

urls.title: Drift
urls.description: On-Chain Perpetual & Spot Trading with Leverage

data.text:
Trade on Drift today:
https://t.co/KD86wOh4Nd

The new slider bar represents the percentage of available collateral you want to allocate per position, instead of across your entire account.

NOTE: This is still a cross-margin system; liquidation can impact your full account if mismanaged. https://t.co/mkFMP53ImK

This new model allows you to:
- Allocate specific portions of collateral per trade
- Use a familiar leverage model like other CEXs
- Run aggressive scalps in one market, conservative swings in another
- Maintain better capital efficiency

Until now, Drift used an account-level leverage system where your total leverage is aggregated across all open positions.

Now, traders can set different leverage limits on all markets. For eg, trade BTC at 15x, SOL at 25x, and WIF at 5x, all within the same account.

Introducing Custom Leverage Per Market

Gain more flexibility, precision, and a familiar experience for controlling risk on Drift. Set custom leverage limits on each market. https://t.co/gmfgTiZrqA

urls.description: Addressing the intricacies of market microstructures.

data.text:
Multiple Concurrent Leaders + Protocol-level ACE will bring CEX-grade precision, on-chain, while staying trustless.

Solana's roadmap would enable global information sync, low-latency trading, and market design flexibility.

Network upgrades like Agave 2.3, @doublezero & Alpenglow would bring:
â†’  ~50ms Inclusion, ~150ms finality
â†’ Better fills, fewer liquidations

BAM by @jito_labs (Block Assembly Marketplace) will be Solanaâ€™s modular infra layer for real-time execution.

Drift will be building into BAM to enable:

- Intra-slot ACE
- TEE-secured confidentiality
- Plugin-based matching logic

@anza_xyz Application-Controlled Execution (ACE) will enable smart contracts that can control transaction ordering.

For Drift perps, this unlocks:
- Taker speed bumps
- Maker cancel priority
- Custom auction logic
- Fairer, lower-slippage trading

Internet Capital Markets are being built on Solana.

Drift co-founder @crispheaney teamed up with @toly, @MaxResnick1, @buffalu__, @Austin_Federa & @KyleSamani to craft the ICM roadmap.
